main event: Two witnesses in Springfield and Dayton, Ohio reported seeing a bluish-white ball of light with a tail that moved at a very high speed on March 2, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared similar to an F-104 fighter jet with an afterburner, but was estimated to be 3-4 times larger.
The object moved in a straight line at a very high speed.
The object was observed by two witnesses separated by several miles, indicating it was at a considerable distance.
The characteristics of the object were similar to a fireball or a balloon.
The report was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program to investigate UFO sightings.
sighted object: bluish-white ball of light with a tail
